article_title: Polish foreign ministry seeks confirmation from Israel.
sentence: The  Polish  foreign  ministry  is  seeking  official  confirmation  from  Israel  about  reports  a  Pole  was  among  the  aid  workers  killed  during  a  suspected  Israeli  strike  on  Gaza.

article_title: Polish foreign ministry seeks confirmation from Israel.
sentence: But,  moments  ago  Polish  foreign  ministry  spokesman  Paweł  Wroński  told  a  news  briefing  the  ministry  had  received  reports,  including  a  statement  from  World  Central  Kitchen  (WCK)  seven  of  its  team,  including  a  Polish  citizen,  had  been  killed  in  the  strike.
